trainerProfile.name: Sameer Sarang
trainerProfile.title: Founder & Financial Services Expert
trainerProfile.description: Founder of Finanthropist based in Nashik, Maharashtra. Sameer provides comprehensive financial services including portfolio management, trading advisory, investment planning, and financial education. He combines practical market expertise with personalized financial solutions for individuals and businesses.
